summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5619 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 2, J. W. Hart's Addition, and Block 2, Dio Richardson's Addition, being the alley between 18th Avenue Northeast and 19th Avenue Northeast, from East 75th Street to East 77th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74123, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
